languages.text: "Пока мы ждем доклада Кляйна, наслаждайтесь закусками и {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}амасеком{/g}, Лорд-капитан".
"While we wait for Klein to report back, please enjoy the refreshments that have been prepared for you, Lord Captain."{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}{/g}
languages.original_text: "Пока мы ждем доклада Кляйна, наслаждайтесь закусками и {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}амасеком{/g}, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "While we're waiting for Klein to report back, refreshments have been prepared for you to enjoy, Lord Captain."
"While we're waiting for Klein to report back, refreshments have been prepared for you to enjoy, Lord Captain."
"While we wait for Klein to report back, please enjoy the refreshments that have been prepared for you, Lord Captain."

"While we wait for Klein to report back, please enjoy the refreshments that have been prepared for you, Lord Captain."{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}{/g}

languages.text: « En attendant que Klein nous fasse part de ses conclusions, je vous invite à profiter des rafraîchissements préparés à votre intention, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}{/g}
languages.original_text: "While we wait for Klein to report back, please enjoy the refreshments that have been prepared for you, Lord Captain."{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}{/g}

traits.locale_text: « En attendant que Klein nous fasse part de ses conclusions, je vous invite à profiter des rafraîchissements préparés à votre intention, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
« En attendant que Klein nous fasse part de ses conclusions, je vous invite à profiter des rafraîchissements préparés à votre intention, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: «Mientras esperamos a que Klein nos informe, disfrute del tentempié que hemos preparado para usted, Lord Capitán».{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}{/g}
languages.original_text: "While we wait for Klein to report back, please enjoy the refreshments that have been prepared for you, Lord Captain."{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}{/g}

traits.locale_text: «Mientras esperamos a que Klein nos informe, disfrute del tentempié que hemos preparado para usted, Lord Capitán».
«Mientras esperamos a que Klein nos informe, disfrute del tentempié que hemos preparado para usted, Lord Capitán».

languages.text: “等待克莱因的报告期间，请慢慢享用为您准备的茶点，舰长大人。”{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}{/g}
languages.original_text: "While we wait for Klein to report back, please enjoy the refreshments that have been prepared for you, Lord Captain."{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}{/g}

traits.locale_text: “等待克莱因的报告期间，请慢慢享用为您准备的茶点，舰长大人。”
“等待克莱因的报告期间，请慢慢享用为您准备的茶点，舰长大人。”{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}{/g}

languages.text: 「クラインの報告を待つ間、事前に軽食を用意したので、ぜひお召し上がりください、ロード・キャプテン」{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}{/g}
languages.original_text: "While we wait for Klein to report back, please enjoy the refreshments that have been prepared for you, Lord Captain."{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}{/g}

traits.locale_text: 「クラインの報告を待つ間、事前に軽食を用意したので、ぜひお召し上がりください、ロード・キャプテン」
「クラインの報告を待つ間、事前に軽食を用意したので、ぜひお召し上がりください、ロード・キャプテン」

languages.text: "Während wir auf Kleins Bericht warten, genießt bitte die Erfrischungen, die für Euch vorbereitet wurden, Lord Captain."{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}{/g}
languages.original_text: "While we wait for Klein to report back, please enjoy the refreshments that have been prepared for you, Lord Captain."{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}{/g}

traits.locale_text: "Während wir auf Kleins Bericht warten, genießt bitte die Erfrischungen, die für Euch vorbereitet wurden, Lord Captain."
"Während wir auf Kleins Bericht warten, genießt bitte die Erfrischungen, die für Euch vorbereitet wurden, Lord Captain."

languages.text: "Klein'ın raporunu beklerken lütfen sizin için hazırladığımız ikramların tadını çıkarın Lord Kaptan."{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}{/g}
languages.original_text: "While we wait for Klein to report back, please enjoy the refreshments that have been prepared for you, Lord Captain."{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}{/g}
